step1.title: Tell Us Your Preferences
step1.description: Start by sharing your gender preference and the qualities or meanings you'd like your Chinese name to represent. You can also choose between traditional and modern naming styles.

step2.title: AI-Powered Name Generation
step2.description: Our advanced AI system analyzes your preferences and creates a culturally authentic Chinese name that matches your desired characteristics.

step3.title: Understanding Your Name
step3.description: Each generated name comes with detailed explanations of its meaning, cultural context, and pronunciation guide in pinyin.

step4.title: Save Your Perfect Name
step4.description: Once you find a name you love, you can save it and receive a beautiful digital certificate with your new Chinese name.
